Text.Page:
Killian has rounded out his forces with paid helpâ€”chaos mistresses and Sihranar mercenaries.

They're dangerous, but not as devoted to Killian as his followers.

Kill them and take their pay. Once we remove the profit from the job, they'll go looking for other work.

Exceptional work! Mercenaries are all about business. They'll leave Killian's service once it's clear there's no upside.

Plus, you just funded Habere's bereavement program for a month. Look at all these coins!
Target the chaos mistresses and Sihranar mercenaries. Those paid soldiers won't stay with Killian if it's clear his end is coming.
